education.skills: NLP, LSTM, MLP, Deep Learning, Feature Extraction
paper: 이미지화된 텍스트의 픽셀 위치 좌표와 벡터 특징을 활용한 LSTM-MLP 기반 한글 혐오 표현 탐지
education.description: Conducted research on hate speech detection. Utilized multimodality by leveraging image-based features and vectorized features to train an LSTM-MLP model for hate speech detection.
Studied English language and literature, focusing on enhancing communication skills and cultural understanding.
